name: Colorable
meaning: "Specious; plausible; having an appearance of right or justice."

name: Colorado beetle
meaning: "A yellowish beetle (Doryphora decemlineata)  with ten longitudinal black dorsal stripes. It has migrated eastwards from its original habitat in Colorado and is very destructive to the potato plant; -- called also potato beetle and potato bug. See Potato beetle."

name: Colorado group
meaning: "A subdivision of the cretaceous formation of western North America  especially developed in Colorado and the upper Missouri region."

name: Coloradoite
meaning: "Mercury telluride  an iron-black metallic mineral found in Colorado."

name: Coloration
meaning: "The act or art of coloring; the state of being colored."

name: Colorature
meaning: "Vocal music colored  as it were by florid ornaments runs or rapid passages."

name: Color-blind
meaning: "Affected with color blindness. See Color blindness  under Color n."

name: Colored
meaning: "Specious; plausible; adorned so as to appear well; as  a highly colored description."
